nodes.text: Zitontown was a run-down mining town located on the planet Mustafar, precariously perched on a ledge overlooking a river of lava. The settlement contained a mining facility and ramshackle houses, which were towered over by a fortified compound that served as headquarters of the Black Sun syndicate during the Clone Wars. The town was named for Ziton Moj, a senior Black Sun Vigo who became leader of the organization during the conflict. The Last Resort was the only bar in Zitontown. A landing platform was located at the edge of the settlement.
